title: Mighty Joe Young
creator_credit: Ernest B Schoedsack, Merian C. Cooper, John Ford, RKO Radio Pictures, Arko Productions and Argosy Pictures
brief_description: Following in the footsteps of King Kong, this is a fantasy story about another giant ape by the name of Joe Young, his devoted owner Jill Young (Terry Moore) and the exploitation Joe Young suffers when he is taken from his native country of Africa back to America and the bright lights of Hollywood. Cast also includes Ben Johnson and Robert Armstrong.
creator_credit_for_label: Ernest B Schoedsack, Merian C. Cooper, John Ford, RKO Radio Pictures, Arko Productions and Argosy Pictures
